mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Day 1 (March 13, 2022):
- Depart from Washington at 10:00 am
- Arrive in New York City at 1:00 pm
- Check-in at The Pierre, A Taj Hotel (495 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022) for a 3-night stay
- Lunch at The Loeb Boathouse (East 72nd Street and Park Drive North, Central Park, New York, NY 10021)
- Visit the Metropolitan Museum of Art (1000 5th Ave, New York, NY 10028) in the afternoon
- Dinner at Le Bernardin (155 W 51st St, New York, NY 10019)

Day 2 (March 14, 2022):
- Breakfast at The Pierre, A Taj Hotel
- Visit the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island (Statue of Liberty National Monument, Jersey City, NJ 07305)
- Lunch at Blue Park Kitchen (239 W 4th St, New York, NY 10014)
- Central Park bike ride and picnic in the afternoon
- Dinner at Babbo (110 Waverly Pl, New York, NY 10011)

Day 3 (March 15, 2022):
- Breakfast at The Pierre, A Taj Hotel
- Visit Times Square and Broadway Shows
- Lunch at Carmine's (2450 Broadway, New York, NY 10023)
- Explore the neighborhoods of Greenwich Village and SoHo in the afternoon
- Dinner at Balthazar (80 Spring St, New York, NY 10012)

Day 4 (March 16, 2022):
- Check-out from The Pierre, A Taj Hotel
- Depart for Albany at 10:00 am
- Arrive in Albany at 1:00 pm
- Check-in at The Morgan State House (39 State St, Albany, NY 12210) for a 2-night stay
- Lunch at Jack's Oyster House (42 State St, Albany, NY 12207)
- Visit the New York State Capitol and Empire State Plaza in the afternoon
- Dinner at Yono's (25 Chapel St, Albany, NY 12210)

Day 5 (March 17, 2022):
- Breakfast at The Morgan State House
- Visit the New York State Museum and the State Education Building in the morning
- Lunch at The Hollow Bar + Kitchen (79 N Pearl St, Albany, NY 12207)
- Explore downtown Albany and Washington Park in the afternoon
- Dinner at Aperitivo Bistro (54 Caroline St, Albany, NY 12206)

Day 6 (March 18, 2022):
- Check-out from The Morgan State House
- Depart for Syracuse at 10:00 am
- Arrive in Syracuse at 1:00 pm
- Check-in at Hotel Skyler (601 W Genesee St, Syracuse, NY 13210) for a 1-night stay
- Lunch at Dinosaur Bar-B-Que (246 W Willow St, Syracuse, NY 13202)
- Visit the Erie Canal Museum and the Museum of Science & Technology in the afternoon
- Dinner at Lemon Grass Thai Cuisine (758 N Crouse Ave, Syracuse, NY 13210)

Day 7 (March 19, 2022):
- Check-out from Hotel Skyler
- Depart for Washington at 10:00 am
- Arrive in Washington at 1:00 pm

Hotel Costs:
- The Pierre, A Taj Hotel (3 nights): $750 ($250/night)
- The Morgan State House (2 nights): $400 ($200/night)
- Hotel Skyler (1 night): $150
Total: $1,300

Transportation Costs:
- Washington to New York City: Self-driving ($18)
- Albany: Self-driving ($364)
- Syracuse: Self-driving ($219)
Total: $601

Food and Entertainment Costs:
- Lunch, Dinner, and Snacks for 7 Days (estimated): $2,600

Total Trip Cost: $4,501

Note that the total trip cost is less than the budgeted $5,500. This leaves an extra $1,000 for additional expenses or any unforeseen costs during the trip. Additionally, all selected accommodations allow smoking in designated areas.
